panels.description: Percentage of all downstream channels that have locked
panels.title: Percentage Downstream Channels Locked

panels.description: Assuming 256QAM modulation, [30dB is the minimum, 33dB or higher is recommended](https://pickmymodem.com/signal-levels-docsis-3-03-1-cable-modem/).
panels.title: Minimum Downstream SNR

panels.description: Percentage of all upstream channels that have locked
panels.title: Percentage Upstream Channels Locked

panels.description: Receive modulation error ratio (RxMER). [The higher the MER, the cleaner the received signal.](https://www.intraway.com/blog/monitoring-DOCSIS-3.1)
panels.title: Downstream SNR

panels.description: Based on data from the past 5 minutes, what percentage of codewords was successfully corrected per second?
panels.title: % Corrected Codewords per Second

panels.description: Based on data from the past 5 minutes, what percentage of codewords could not be corrected per second?
panels.title: Uncorrectable Codewords per Second

panels.description: Center frequency and width of each upstream channel
panels.title: Upstream Channel Frequency Info

panels.description: Time for each scrape page to return HTML
panels.title: SB Exporter Scrape Duration

panels.description: For each section of HTML that metrics are parsed from, count of the number of scrape/parse cycles where data was as expected versus total. Values departing from 1.0 indicate scraped HTML didn't contain expected structure/data.

targets.expr:
(sum(meta_parse_result_total{parse_result="True", instance=~"$exporter_instance"}) by (parse_target, parse_result)) 
/ 
on(parse_target) group_left 
sum(meta_parse_result_total{instance=~"$exporter_instance"}) by (parse_target)

panels.title: Parse result by target

panels.description: Just another way of presenting the same info
panels.title: Parse result by target

list.description: Which exporter instance / modem is being scraped
list.label: Modem
list.name: exporter_instance
